code: var getUserName=function getUserName(){return localStorage.getItem('userName');};var setUserName=function setUserName(value){return localStorage.setItem('userName',value);};var removeUserName=function removeUserName(){return localStorage.removeItem('userName');};var isAuth=function isAuth(){return!!getUserName();};var getAllUserInfos=function getAllUserInfos(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('allUserInfos'));};var updateAllUserInfos=function updateAllUserInfos(value){return localStorage.setItem('allUserInfos',JSON.stringify(value));};var getProductsData=function getProductsData(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('productsData'));};var updateProductsData=function updateProductsData(value){return localStorage.setItem('productsData',JSON.stringify(value));};var getCurrentUserInfos=function getCurrentUserInfos(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('allUserInfos'))[getUserName()];};var getCategorysData=function getCategorysData(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('categorysData'));};var getAllProductCommentInfos=function getAllProductCommentInfos(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('allProductCommentInfos'));};var updateAllProductCommentInfos=function updateAllProductCommentInfos(value){return localStorage.setItem('allProductCommentInfos',JSON.stringify(value));};var getCurProductCommentInfosById=function getCurProductCommentInfosById(id){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('allProductCommentInfos'))[id];};var getCurrentProduct=function getCurrentProduct(id){return getProductsData()[id];};export{getUserName,setUserName,removeUserName,isAuth,getAllUserInfos,getProductsData,getCurrentProduct,updateProductsData,updateAllUserInfos,getCurrentUserInfos,getAllProductCommentInfos,updateAllProductCommentInfos,getCurProductCommentInfosById,getCategorysData};
